name: AliciaSermon-HoustonRealEstateAgent
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Call Alicia at (281) 369-6514 for all information about Houston. Alicia Sermon is a local Houston real estate agent with TX Alliance Realty Group.

This is your local Flash Briefing to help you sell, buy, and rent Houston real estate with your Houston real estate agent Alicia Sermon.

This Realtor Flash Briefing was created on the My Home Agent Real Estate Leads | Realtor Marketing platform. If you’re a real estate agent or broker who wants real estate leads from a custom Realtor Flash Briefing and to brand and market your realty services, visit us at https://www.FindMyHomeAgent.com.

A flash briefing provides a quick overview of news and other content such as comedy, interviews, and lists. A flash briefing skill provides content for a customer's flash briefing. The flash briefing skill API defines the format of content and enables you to create flash briefing skills.

Customers discover and enable flash briefing skills in the flash briefing section under settings in the app, or by searching for "flash briefing" in the skills section of the app. Customers can also enable their favorite provider through voice, the first time they listen to flash briefing.

When you create a flash briefing skill, you have a chance for your original content to reach customers daily. Update your content at least daily, and you can make changes as often as every 15 minutes. The system caches your content to ensure optimal performance and minimal latency for customers.

Visit us at https://www.FindMyHomeAgent.com for more information to learn more about real estate leads and our Realtor marketing.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
